WGUS83 KLBF 291904
FLSLBF

FLOOD ADVISORY
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE NORTH PLATTE NE
104 PM CST MON DEC 29 2014

NEC111-011900-
/O.NEW.KLBF.FA.Y.0029.141229T1904Z-150101T1900Z/
/00000.N.IJ.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/
LINCOLN NE-
104 PM CST MON DEC 29 2014

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN NORTH PLATTE HAS ISSUED A

* FLOOD ADVISORY FOR ICE JAM FLOODING IN...
  CENTRAL LINCOLN COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST NEBRASKA...

* UNTIL 100 PM CST THURSDAY

* TRAINED WEATHER SPOTTERS REPORTED MINOR FLOODING ON THE SOUTH      
  PLATTE RIVER NEAR IRON EAGLE GOLF COURSE. THIS MINOR FLOODING IS   
  BEING CAUSED BY AN ICE JAM. AT THIS TIME...THE HIGHER WATERS       
  ASSOCIATED WITH THIS ICE JAM ARE EXPECTED TO REMAIN EAST OF        
  THE NORTH PLATTE CITY LIMITS.   

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

DO NOT DRIVE YOUR VEHICLE INTO AREAS WHERE THE WATER COVERS THE
ROADWAY. THE WATER DEPTH MAY BE TOO GREAT TO ALLOW YOUR CAR TO CROSS
SAFELY.

&&

LAT...LON 4112 10059 4103 10060 4104 10075 4113 10074

$$

TAYLOR
